# init(blurEffect:)

**Initializer**

Creates a vibrancy effect for a specific blur effect.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(blurEffect: UIBlurEffect)
```

## Parameters

- **blurEffect**: The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBlurEffect] used by the blurred view the vibrancy effect is attached to.

## Return Value

The vibrancy effect to be used by a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIVisualEffectView] object.

## Discussion

When you create a new vibrancy effect, use the same [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBlurEffect] that you used to create the blur view. Using a different [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBlurEffect] can cause unwanted visual effect combinations.

## Creating a vibrancy effect

- **init(forBlurEffect:style:)**: Creates a vibrancy effect with the specified blur and style values.
- **UIVibrancyEffectStyle**: Constants for the vibrancy styles.
